translation.en: composed of Mexican-Americans, Native Americans and Dust Bowl cowboys,
translation.ko: 멕시코계 미국인, 아메리카 원주민 카우보이로 구성된 한 부대가 왔다

translation.en: most of whom couldn't drink together in the same bars back home,
translation.ko: 미국에선 같은 바에서 어울려 술도 마실 수 없었던 그들이

translation.en: landed in Sicily and began a brutal 500-day trek through Nazi-occupied Europe.
translation.ko: 시칠리아에 상륙해 나치가 점령한 유럽을 500여 일간 관통하는 혹독한 여정을 시작했다

translation.en: This is the story of those men.
How the hell can Coldfoot see anything? I can't even see my fuckin' boots.
translation.ko: 콜드풋 눈엔 뭐가 보이나? 난 내 군화도 안 보이는데

translation.en: -What's he lookin' at? -He's looking at the fog.
translation.ko: - 뭘 보는 거지? - 안개를 보는 거야

translation.en: The fog? What the fuck does that mean? We can all see the fog.
translation.ko: 안개? 그게 뭔 소리야? 안개야 누군들 못 보나

translation.en: Just make sure you can see him.
-Spigs, get down! -I'm tryin'! Ah! Shit! I'm hit. Fuck!
Two Panzers, four platoons of infantry, 500 yards ahead.
All right. Let's go, Nagles, come on!
No, no, no! Don't go under the trees. Stay out in the open!
translation.ko: 나무 쪽은 피해, 탁 트인 데로 가

translation.en: Garcia, Rosa, check out that barn.
They fell back two miles south and they're still moving.
Six dead or missing. At least ten wounded.
I wanna know where the Germans are sleeping tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 독일군이 어디서 묵을지 알아야 해

translation.en: He was hiding in the barn, sir. He won't shut up.
We need Spigs to tell us what the hell he's saying.
Found this in his hiding place.
[in Italian] Give me it. Give me it.
Give me it. Give me it.
All right, get him inside. Get some food in him.
[man] Spigliani. -[in Italian] Do you speak Italian? -Yes.
[in Boston accent] Park the car in Harvard Yard.
Where did you learn to swim, Private Spigliani?
How the hell do you know that?
I was a graduate student at MIT.
I lived on Maple, near the intersection of 4th.
-It's a small world, isn't it? -You can say that again.
I got attached at Salerno as an interpreter.
And their leader, he is an Indian, too?
Things must be getting desperate in America
if they're allowing these types into your army.
translation.ko: 이런 인간들을 부대에 받아준 걸 보면

translation.en: Red men and Mexicans. Inferior races.
translation.ko: 인디언과 멕시코인 같은 열등한 인종을 쓰다니

translation.en: and the bars have signs out front that say…
They make their Negroes there drink from separate water fountains.
So don't tell me they're Americans just like you.
translation.ko: 다 너와 같은 미국인이란 말 집어치워

translation.en: To fight for a country where you can't even enjoy a beer…
at the same bar as your fellow soldier.
translation.ko: 맥주도 못 마시는 나라를 위해 싸우다니

translation.en: So… please now tell me about the ponds.
Yes, I need to know what you did about the ponds.
What ponds? I don't know what the hell you're talking about.
-What did you do with the ponds! -We didn't see any fucking ponds.
translation.ko: - 폰츠를 어떻게 했냐고 - 폰트는 본 적도 없어요

translation.en: -You're lying! -Jesus Christ, I'm telling you the truth.
Your company crossed three ponds in two days.
What are the conditions of those ponds?
Ponte. Br-- Bridges. You're talking about bridges.
I used the Italian word, didn't I?
What are the conditions of those bridges?
We didn't touch the bridges. They're all there.
The war for you is over.
You may even get to enjoy swimming in Charlestown again.
translation.ko: 넌 찰스타운에서 다시 수영을 즐길 수 있겠지만

translation.en: But by this time tomorrow, your cowboy and Indian friends will all be dead.
translation.ko: 내일 이 시간이면 그 카우보이와 인디언 친구들은 죽고 없을 거야

translation.en: The kid's looking at the photos on your gun.
translation.ko: 애가 대위님 총에 붙은 사진을 보고 있네요

translation.en: [in Italian] I have no family. Everyone is dead.
We, uh, we got that part.
[in English] He says his, um, mother and father died.
He's been living here with his grandfather. Till he died.
translation.ko: 여기서 할아버지와 살고 있었는데 할아버지도 돌아가시고

translation.en: He's been hiding from the Germans for the last month.
translation.ko: 지난 한 달간 독일군을 피해 숨어 있었답니다

translation.en: We lost them, sir. They're using the rain to screen their movements.
translation.ko: 놈들을 놓쳤습니다 비를 방패 삼아 이동하고 있어요

translation.en: Ask him if he knows where the Germans are.
Well, he's scared as shit, man.
-Jesus, Gomez, what did you do to him? -I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: - 고메스, 뭔 짓을 한 거야? - 내가 뭘?

translation.en: Ah, the Germans, man. They told him that first we were gonna feed him
translation.ko: 독일놈들 말이 우리가 일단 실컷 먹인 다음

translation.en: and then we were gonna do it to him.
translation.ko: 독일놈들 말이 우리가 일단 실컷 먹인 다음 그 짓을 할 거랬대

translation.en: Hey, man, tell him we're not interested.
-Tell him we already bagged our limit. -Tell him they're too small.
translation.ko: - 한도 초과했다고 전해 - 너무 작다고 전해

translation.en: Tell him the Germans aren't coming back.
Sir, are you sure you want me to tell him that?
are the grandsons of the greatest Indian warriors
They've killed mountain lion, hunted buffalo.
they're the descendants of the powerful Mexican army
that defeated the French on Cinco de Mayo.
who brought the rule of law
to places where only killers and thieves lived before.
Tell him the Nazis are never gonna hurt him again.
translation.ko: 다신 나치가 해칠 일 없을 거라고도 전해

translation.en: Because tomorrow, we're gonna find 'em and stop 'em.
There now. Doesn't that feel better?
No man should have to walk around covering his privates.
He actually made the kid believe we could do it.
translation.ko: 꼬마가 대위님 말에 설득된 것 같아

translation.en: Wasn't the kid he was convincing.
A gift from our young friend.
It was his grandfather's. He wants you to have it.
I cut down the barrel to make it more practical.
He also told me where the Germans are.
Watch the grass in the middle.
-We need to take him to a field hospital. -Hold this.
translation.ko: - 야전 병원으로 옮겨야 한다 - 여기 눌러

translation.en: [in English] All right. Hang in there. Hang in there. Stay still. Come on!
-Get him outta here. Now! -Here we go. Come on. Get him up.
translation.ko: - 당장 옮겨야 해 - 좋아, 들어 올리자

translation.en: Finished a stint in Hawaii, then three years of college.
translation.ko: 하와이에서 군 복무를 마치고 대학을 3년 다녔군

translation.en: I ran out of money, sir.
Give the Army another couple of years, then go back and graduate.
translation.ko: 한 2년 더 복무하고 가서 졸업하면 되겠군

translation.en: You did hear there might be a war on the horizon?
translation.ko: 저 멀리에서 전쟁이 날 거란 소식은 들었나?

translation.en: I caught wind of that, yes, sir.
If that happens, we're gonna need every good officer we can get our hands on.
translation.ko: 그리되면 쓸 만한 장교란 장교는 다 필요할 거야

translation.en: If that happens, I intend to be one of them, sir.
What got you in the Army in the first place?
I had to leave home when I was 17.
Hunted all over the west for work,
ended up skinny and starving in San Francisco.
Army recruiter bought me a meal,
said that if I signed up, I'd get three just like it every day.
translation.ko: 입대하면 그런 식사를 하루 세끼 먹을 수 있다더군요

translation.en: Your previous CO said you're good at handling problems.
Well, I've got one. One of my companies, J Company,
has failed every live fire test for the past three months.
translation.ko: 지난 석 달간 실탄 사격 시험에서 번번이 떨어졌어

translation.en: -Do you think you can shape them up? -Yes, sir.
-I'm looking for J Company. -Uh, over there.
[Gomez] Turn off that fucking gringo music.
-Um, Lt. Danalli, sir. -Lt. Danalli is now relieved.
My name is Sparks. I want a list of all prisoners and charges.
translation.ko: 난 스파크스다, 모든 재소자와 그들의 죄목을 알아야겠어

translation.en: We get a lot of that in here.
The Indians and the Mexicans don't like each other much.
And they both hate us more.
There's a river down there, the Caheesh.
It's the best in the world.

translation.ko: 몬태나 윌살 출신 양 목축지로 유명하지

translation.en: What do you do about the wolves?
Who the hell gave you that?
Shit, I don't want you. I want him.
The fact that I'm talking to you in a jailhouse
tells me you didn't get on well with your previous COs.
translation.ko: 여러분이 전 지휘관과 사이가 안 좋았다는 뜻이다

translation.en: Maybe you were told you're too stupid for this army.
Maybe you were told you got a problem with authority or…
you were told you come from a race…
that's got no business wearing the uniform.
Whatever you've been told doesn't mean shit to me.
translation.ko: 무슨 말을 들었건 내 알 바 아냐

translation.en: There's a live fire test at the end of the week.
translation.ko: 오는 금요일에 실탄 사격 시험이 있다

translation.en: and you can enjoy a weekend of freedom.
Forty-eight hours, not only outside this cage…
that you and the US Army have reached the end of your journey together,
But if you want the chance to prove
translation.ko: 하지만 온갖 개자식들이 자신에게 퍼부은 온갖 막말이

translation.en: that everything that every asshole ever said about you is wrong…
translation.ko: 하지만 온갖 개자식들이 자신에게 퍼부은 온갖 막말이 틀렸다는 걸 증명하고 싶다면

translation.en: you got two minutes to lace up and join me outside.
Shall we give them another minute, sir?
It doesn't take another minute to figure this out.
or can you really get us off-post?
translation.ko: 아니면 진짜 밖에 보내 주는 겁니까?

translation.en: Only if the whole group passes.
-What's the story with Coldfoot? -What story, sir?
He's been in the Army over three years. Why is he still a private?
translation.ko: 복무한 지 3년이 넘도록 왜 아직 일병인 거지?

translation.en: He used to be corporal. Up for a promotion to sergeant.
and it ended in a big fight.
He got in a fight because he was denied promotion?
It was his third rejection, sir.
Coldfoot is an Indian with pride, Lieutenant.
It's… it's not a very "healthy combination around here.
[master sergeant] No wonder you feather-heads lost all your land.
translation.ko: 이러니 너희 깃털 머리들이 땅을 다 잃었지

translation.en: Here I thought it was 'cause you couldn't hold your liquor.
translation.ko: 술이 너무 약해서 날려 먹은 줄 알았는데

translation.en: But all this time, it was 'cause you couldn't shoot worth a fuck.
What mojado taught you to fire a gun, Gomez?
translation.ko: 어떤 밀입국 멕시코 잡것이 총질 가르쳐 줬어, 고메스?

translation.en: You got a problem with something, boy?
will you look who's back, boys?
I thought we got rid of you, prairie nigger.
Trust me, it is just a matter of time--
translation.ko: 장담하는데, 너 보내는 건 시간 문제…

translation.en: Master Sergeant, can my men get a little more of your instruction
and a little less of your commentary?
I forgot you're new around here.
translation.ko: 새로 부임하신 걸 깜박하고 말을 안 했군요

translation.en: See, this here is my firing range.
That means when your men step onto my range,
translation.ko: 소위님 부하들이 제 사격장에 발을 딛는 순간

translation.en: That's funny, Sergeant, 'cause the way I see it is…
when I bring my men onto your range…

translation.ko: 상사가 저들의 교관이 되는 건데 말이지

translation.en: So far, all they've gotten from you is a dissertation on their diets
translation.ko: 지금까진 저들의 식습관과 모친을 모욕하는 말만

translation.en: and the sexual habits of their mothers, so…
how about doing a little work?
a man don't toss words around like that…
translation.ko: 그딴 식으로 말 던지는 건 실례예요

translation.en: unless he's willing to back them up.
What goes on behind that shed
You'd better start thinking how you're gonna explain these bruises, sir.
translation.ko: 어쩌다 든 멍인지 둘러댈 핑계나 생각하시죠

translation.en: Fair warning, boys. You go back there, you'll have company.
translation.ko: 경고하는데, 거기 갔다간 일행 더 생길 줄 알아

translation.en: I was wondering how I was gonna explain that.
Shall we pick up where we left off, gentlemen?
-Best scores of any group. -Thank you, sir.
translation.ko: - 자네 그룹 성적이 제일 좋군 - 감사합니다

translation.en: We credit the master sergeant with our success.
Excellent work, Master Sergeant. Sorry to hear about your little accident.
translation.ko: 수고했어, 상사 사고 소식 들었네, 유감이야

translation.en: There's a problem with Coldfoot. He's going into town.
-Yeah, he's got a pass. -It's where he's going that's a problem.
translation.ko: - 시험에 통과했잖아 - 녀석이 가려는 곳이 문제예요

translation.en: They'll only call the MPs, have you thrown in jail.
translation.ko: 헌병대에 신고 들어가서 철창신세가 될 뿐일 텐데

translation.en: That nothing in this army leads to anything good.
translation.ko: 이 군대에선 좋은 꼴 볼 일이 없다는 거요

translation.en: What if I told you I'd put you up for sergeant this week?
translation.ko: 이번 주에 병장 진급 대상에 올려 주겠다면?

translation.en: No offense, Lieutenant, but I've been up for sergeant before.
You wait and wait and then they give you an excuse and tell you no.
translation.ko: 기다려 봤자 핑계 대면서 퇴짜 놓을 게 뻔해요

translation.en: -I ain't waiting anymore. -You don't have to.
translation.ko: - 더는 안 기다려요 - 안 기다려도 돼

translation.en: Get in the car, Sergeant Coldfoot.
The shrapnel went through your abdomen and sliced open your liver.
-You wanna tell me what the lucky part is? -You should be dead.
translation.ko: - 어디가 운이 좋다는 거죠? - 안 죽었잖아요

translation.en: Quick action by your men saved your life.
If you ever see them again, I suggest taking them out for a steak dinner.
when do I go back to Italy?
Your combat days are over, Captain.
Next stop for you is home.
Congratulations, Captain. You've got a million-dollar wound.
With winter setting in, the fighting south of Rome continues.
translation.ko: 겨울이 왔지만 로마 남쪽 전투는 여전합니다

translation.en: Allied troops are dug in, waiting for the next German counterattack,
translation.ko: 연합군은 참호 속에서 독일군의 반격에 대비 중입니다

translation.en: The going is tough, but so are our boys.
Ask any one of them and they'll tell you
translation.ko: 아무나 잡고 물어보세요 이렇게 답할 겁니다

translation.en: it'll take a lot more than a little rain and mud
translation.ko: 이 정도 비와 진흙 따위론 절대로 미군 병사를

translation.en: to get these GI Joes down.
translation.ko: 이 정도 비와 진흙 따위론 절대로 미군 병사를 쓰러뜨릴 수 없다고 말이죠

translation.en: I need transportation, Captain. I'm not that damn particular. You'll do.
translation.ko: 교통편이 필요해, 대위 자네가 운전해 주면 좋겠는데

translation.en: Okay, now that you've seen it…
I'm thirsty. Let's get a drink.
It happened a week after you were wounded.
translation.ko: 자네가 부상당하고 일주일 후 이렇게 됐네

translation.en: It threw me 20 feet in the air, took off everything below the knee.
translation.ko: 6m쯤 붕 떴나 봐 무릎 아래가 날아갔지

translation.en: in this war, getting promoted is easy.
The hard part is staying alive.
They're stuck on the Gustav Line south of Cassino.
translation.ko: 카시노 남쪽 구스타프 방어선에 막혀 있어

translation.en: It's cold, wet and shitty. They're hangin' tough.
translation.ko: 춥고 축축하고 더러운 곳에서 꿋꿋이 버티고 있다네

translation.en: Who'd you send in for me?
He's not you, but he's okay.
[sighs] When are they, uh, sending you home, sir?
I was going to offer to take any letters back for you,
but I hear that won't be necessary.
I feel I should be in Italy. I oughta be with my men.
translation.ko: 이탈리아에 가서 부하들과 함께해야만 할 것 같아요

translation.en: Go home, Felix. Go home to Mary.
See your son, raise more babies.
I've never been a good letter writer, so I don't know if I can explain this.
translation.ko: 편지 쓰는 덴 젬병이라 이걸 어떻게 설명해야 할지…

translation.en: Hell, I'm not sure I can explain it even to myself.
When I left you to come over here,
I was scared of losing you.
There's an Army captain out there.
He wants to hitch a ride back to Italy.
[Sparks] I guess the only way to explain my decision
translation.ko: 내 결정을 설명할 수 있는 유일한 말은

translation.en: is that it isn't my time to come home yet.
translation.ko: 아직은 집에 갈 때가 아니란 거야

translation.en: What's it look like I'm doing, Doc?
You walk out of here, Captain, you'll be AWOL.
[Sparks] I know you want me home. Make no mistake, I wanna be home.
translation.ko: 내 귀환을 바라는 거 알아 나도 가고 싶어

translation.en: I wanna hold my son in my arms
and lay with you on a quiet desert night beneath the stars.
translation.ko: 별이 빛나는 조용한 사막에서 당신과 나란히 눕고 싶어

translation.en: But I owe something to a group of men.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 부하들에게 진 빚이 있어

translation.en: and now I know as well as I know myself.
If I came home, I could never live with myself,
translation.ko: 이대로 귀환하면 그들에게 진 빚을 떠올리며

translation.en: knowing I owed a debt to them and ignored it.
translation.ko: 평생 날 용서 못 할 거란 걸

translation.en: So I have to complete this journey I've started.
translation.ko: 내가 시작한 이 여정을 마무리 지어야만 해

translation.en: Anything less would leave a hole in my conscience that I could never repair.
translation.ko: 그랬다간 평생을 양심의 가책에 시달릴 거야

translation.en: I was just released from a hospital in North Africa, sir.
I was hoping to be reassigned to my old company.
What happened to your orders, Captain?
They were to send me home.
Mary, I don't expect you to understand.
I'm having a hard time understanding it myself.
But I have never been more sure of anything in my life
translation.ko: 하지만 이렇게 확신이 든 건 평생 처음이야

translation.en: and I have to trust that.
Get back to your foxhole, soldier. That's an order.
What are you looking at, Sergeant?
♪ Hearts are breaking All the way to hell ♪
